<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1298059_hr.resolveRecord</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>resolveRecord</name><script><![CDATA[function resolveRecord() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord(' x_1298059_hr_human_resource');
    if (gr.get(current.sys_id)) {
        // Update the record
        gr.update();
    }
}
// Call the server-side function to resolve the record
resolveRecord();
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-06 09:19:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>bb153fc347dd021004c8d44a516d4343</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>resolveRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_1298059_hr">8e7e4eb54711021004c8d44a516d4360</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">8e7e4eb54711021004c8d44a516d4360</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bb153fc347dd021004c8d44a516d4343</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-06 18:28:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
